column1: The ground shakes violently, throwing all crew members to their knees. There’s a 1 in 6 chance rubble from nearby buildings falls onto the characters—each crew member must pass a DEX check or suffer D4 wounds.
An impossibly high volcano blocks the crew’s path, forcing them to walk around it (+1○).
Lava covers this whole area, making it completely inaccessible. The crew must find a different hex to pass through.
